properties.Observatio: A tributary of Belihul Oya, a major tributary of the Mahaweli River. During the rainy season, there is a risk of bank erosion due to the huge amount of water flowing down.
properties.Descript_1: Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenanceVegetative cov

properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1: 9" thk flat Rubble paving in 1:6 Cement mortarVegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure
